welcome_message_body: "Welcome to San Francisco Chimalpa, a charming city known for its rich culture and beautiful landscapes. We invite you to explore and immerse yourself in our vibrant community. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The original and largest terminal at Internacional Benito Juarez Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal primarily used for international flights, with modern amenities and facilities.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for domestic flights, with a more relaxed atmosphere and fewer crowds.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require a login or registration process.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal at Licenciado Adolfo Lopez Mateos International Airport, primarily serving domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport. Network name may vary depending on your location.
